item.title: 将inf和nan替换为其他变量
item.description: 在单个变量中，可用if判断语句 Ta = NaN; tfa = isnan(Ta); if (tfa == 1) Ta = 0; end %----------------分割线--------------% Tb = Inf; tfb = isinf(Tb); if (tfb == 1) Tb = 0; end 在矩阵变量中，可用如下方式进行替换 a = 1 NaN 2 3 >> a(isnan(a)) = 123 a = 1 123 2 3 >> a = [1 inf 2 3] a = 1 Inf 2 3 >> a(a == inf) = 123 a = 1 123 2 3
